title: Cant connect to chat service

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
I've just installed the game after a little while of not playing and i wanted to play with some friends but it 
keeps logging onto chat servive with no result. I have tried deleting the profile, restarting my pc, changing date launching and 
changing it back but nothing helped so far.

replies.body: I've seen a few reports on this where some players can't connect to chat, and it's a case we're currently looking into it.  In the meantime, you can give our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide a shot to see if that helps.  Thanks for your patience!
